required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 14, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Face Masks During Exercise
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Face Coverings During Physical Activity

brief_summary.textblock: To describe the primary and secondary outcomes of athletes during a Cardiopulmonary Exercise Test (CPET) on a cycle ergometer with and without a face mask.

primary_outcome.measure: VO2 max during cardiopulmonary exercise testing on a cycle ergometer
primary_outcome.description: Exercise capacity measured by Cosmed K5 metabolic equipment

primary_outcome.measure: VO2 max during cardiopulmonary exercise testing on a cycle ergometer
primary_outcome.description: Exercise capacity measured by Cosmed K5 metabolic equipment

primary_outcome.measure: Test duration (time) of cardiopulmonary exercise test on a cycle ergometer
Test duration (time) of cardiopulmonary exercise test on a cycle ergometer
Reaction time of cognitive performance testing during cardiopulmonary exercise test on a cycle ergometer
primary_outcome.description: Cognitive testing will take place at the end of each stage of the CPET. Cognitive testing using the SACL Cognition application on iPad will include a baseline SRT measurement and additional measurements at the end of each stage of the CPET. The baseline will include a 30s session of SRT for familiarization and then a 30s session will be scored. SRT will then be administered for 30s at the end of each stage of the CPET. The SRT task includes a visual stimulus presented on the touchscreen. Subjects will be instructed to press the stimulus on-screen as quickly as possible. Reaction time will be measured on the SRT task. Reaction time is calculated as the average amount of time in seconds between stimulus presentation and user response within a session.

primary_outcome.measure: Reaction time of cognitive performance testing during cardiopulmonary exercise test on a cycle ergometer
primary_outcome.description: Cognitive testing will take place at the end of each stage of the CPET. Cognitive testing using the SACL Cognition application on iPad will include a baseline SRT measurement and additional measurements at the end of each stage of the CPET. The baseline will include a 30s session of SRT for familiarization and then a 30s session will be scored. SRT will then be administered for 30s at the end of each stage of the CPET. The SRT task includes a visual stimulus presented on the touchscreen. Subjects will be instructed to press the stimulus on-screen as quickly as possible. Reaction time will be measured on the SRT task. Reaction time is calculated as the average amount of time in seconds between stimulus presentation and user response within a session.

primary_outcome.measure: Accuracy of cognitive performance testing during cardiopulmonary exercise test on a cycle ergometer
primary_outcome.description: Cognitive testing will take place at the end of each stage of the CPET. Cognitive testing using the SACL Cognition application on iPad will include a baseline SRT measurement and additional measurements at the end of each stage of the CPET. The baseline will include a 30s session of SRT for familiarization and then a 30s session will be scored. SRT will then be administered for 30s at the end of each stage of the CPET. The SRT task includes a visual stimulus presented on the touchscreen. Subjects will be instructed to press the stimulus on-screen as quickly as possible. Accuracy will be measured on the SRT task. Accuracy is calculated as the total number of correct responses to stimuli divided by the total number of stimuli presented during a session (presented as a percentage).

primary_outcome.measure: Accuracy of cognitive performance testing during cardiopulmonary exercise test on a cycle ergometer
primary_outcome.description: Cognitive testing will take place at the end of each stage of the CPET. Cognitive testing using the SACL Cognition application on iPad will include a baseline SRT measurement and additional measurements at the end of each stage of the CPET. The baseline will include a 30s session of SRT for familiarization and then a 30s session will be scored. SRT will then be administered for 30s at the end of each stage of the CPET. The SRT task includes a visual stimulus presented on the touchscreen. Subjects will be instructed to press the stimulus on-screen as quickly as possible. Accuracy will be measured on the SRT task. Accuracy is calculated as the total number of correct responses to stimuli divided by the total number of stimuli presented during a session (presented as a percentage).

secondary_outcome.measure: Subjective dyspnea rating during cardiopulmonary exercise testing on a cycle ergometer
secondary_outcome.description: The Modified Borg Dyspnea Scale (0-10) will be used to assess subjective shortness of breath. Measured during each stage of the exercise protocol during cardiopulmonary exercise test on a cycle ergometer.

secondary_outcome.measure: Subjective dyspnea rating during cardiopulmonary exercise testing on a cycle ergometer
secondary_outcome.description: The Modified Borg Dyspnea Scale (0-10) will be used to assess subjective shortness of breath. Measured during each stage of the exercise protocol during cardiopulmonary exercise test on a cycle ergometer.

secondary_outcome.measure: Ratings of perceived exertion during cardiopulmonary exercise testing on a cycle ergometer
secondary_outcome.description: The Borg Rating of Perceived Exertion (6-20) scale will be used during the test to assess subjective exertion. Measured during each stage of the exercise protocol during cardiopulmonary exercise test on a cycle ergometer

secondary_outcome.measure: Ratings of perceived exertion during cardiopulmonary exercise testing on a cycle ergometer
secondary_outcome.description: The Borg Rating of Perceived Exertion (6-20) scale will be used during the test to assess subjective exertion. Measured during each stage of the exercise protocol during cardiopulmonary exercise test on a cycle ergometer

secondary_outcome.measure: Oxygen saturation during cardiopulmonary exercise testing on a cycle ergometer
secondary_outcome.description: Measured by a pulse oximeter during each stage of the exercise protocol of the cardiopulmonary exercise test on a cycle ergometer

secondary_outcome.measure: Oxygen saturation during cardiopulmonary exercise testing on a cycle ergometer
secondary_outcome.description: Measured by a pulse oximeter during each stage of the exercise protocol of the cardiopulmonary exercise test on a cycle ergometer

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood lactate during cardiopulmonary exercise testing on a cycle ergometer
secondary_outcome.description: Blood lactate will be measured pre and post-CPET using a Nova Medical Lactate Plus: Blood Lactate Measuring Meter-Version 2 device.

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood lactate during cardiopulmonary exercise testing on a cycle ergometer
secondary_outcome.description: Blood lactate will be measured pre and post-CPET using a Nova Medical Lactate Plus: Blood Lactate Measuring Meter-Version 2 device.

arm_group.description: Cross-over randomization. Participants randomized to this arm will not wear a cloth face mask for Test 1 which they do a progressive step-exercise cycling test to exhaustion
Cross-over randomization. Participants randomized to this arm will wear a cloth face mask for Test 1 which they do a progressive step-exercise cycling test to exhaustion

intervention.description: Participants will complete a Cardiopulmonary Exercise test on cycle ergometer in which they will perform progressive step-exercise cycling to exhaustion
Cognitive Performance will be tested using a cognition application on an iPad during the Cardiopulmonary Exercise Test.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Be able to come to Baylor Scott & White Sports Therapy and Research at The Star in Frisco, Texas twice in three weeks.
- Be willing to wear a face mask during exercise capacity testing on a stationary bicycle.
Exclusion Criteria:
-

facility.name: Baylor Scott & White Sports Therapy & Research at The Star

responsible_party.investigator_title: Research Center Director - The STAR at Frisco
